attributes.review:
Downloaded app for news and relevant info for campaign, ended up with unorganized biased mess of “information.” If you’re gonna make an app for a presidential election try to make it a bit less repulsive. 
     Would not recommend. Get your info from elsewhere that actually gives you info from both sides and not just propaganda with loads of childish name-calling.
attributes.title: Hard to navigate, incredibly biased news

attributes.review: This app is the worst thing to ever happen to the App Store when I first opened it I saw something that was completely repulsive I cannot believe people can download this disgusting and absolutely horrible app. I cannot believe this app was in my suggested. This app needs to be deleted, this app needs to go and never come back. This is completely and utterly ridiculous, disgusting, repulsive, and it’s just wrong😭🤮
attributes.title: #genzsavestiktok

attributes.review: this app is very bad, now you might be asking why, well i’ll tell you why. it shows a picture of a cheeto as soon as you open it which is extremely unprofessional. if you thought that was bad there is also a man, a very scary man, and one look at that man and you’ll be having nightmares!! if you thought a cheeto and a scary constipated man was bad enough just wait till you see the quality, it just terrible! it’s almost as if this app was asking for bad reviews. i hope you all see what’s going on as this app is a complete disappointment. also due to the very scary fat orange man on the front i will not be able to sleep tonight, very disappointing..😾✌🏼✨
attributes.title: this app is disappointing😹

attributes.review: I am genuinely confused by this app. I see there is a points reward system but I was under the impression you’re my president but this seems like a get a free drink after donating so much money to our already beyond rich business man president kind of deal. The events tab is nice for keeping you updated on all of trumps newest rallies and maybe i will help get the stands full again to make up for the embarrassment of the tulsa rally!
attributes.title: Confused?

attributes.review: I tried to download this app to support my fav cheeto 😍😍 I was so excited to hop on the white supremacy trend🤩🐵 but as soon as i opened it it crashed 🤮 i uninstalled 💅 and downloaded it again💃🧜 but the same thing happened! Soon enough I was getting emails and texts 🧟 with nothing but BIDEN 2020 written over them😣I just know one of those gen z snowflakes did this ❄️❄️I’m pretty sure the app has been hacked by no good liberals😢😢 do not download!!!
attributes.title: 🧚✨no 🥰🤯💗

attributes.review: This app is the horrible stop ever it’s going to be in TickTock if no one if not that many people doesn’t leave a like one star review and then all I did see on this app would you have to buy a whole bunch of stuff so you should not download it so whoever is trying to do this just download it and install it well write a review and then uninstall it so all happens so you can save TickTock thank you
attributes.title: It’s horrible

attributes.review:
Now, this is a story all about how
My life got flipped-turned upside down
And I'd like to take a minute
Just sit right there
I'll tell you how I became the prince of a town called Bel Air
In west Philadelphia born and raised
On the playground was where I spent most of my days
Chillin' out maxin' relaxin' all cool
And all shootin some b-ball outside of the school
When a couple of guys who were up to no good
Started making trouble in my neighborhood
I got in one little fight and my mom got scared
She said 'You're movin' with your auntie and uncle in Bel Air'
I begged and pleaded with her day after day
But she packed my suit case and sent me on my way
She gave me a kiss and then she gave me my ticket.
I put my Walkman on and said, 'I might as well kick it'.…
attributes.title: It was Philadelphia

attributes.review: this app makes me feel disgusted. it took hours to download and didn’t even live up to its satisfaction. i hated every single bit of it and wish this orange cheeto puff that we call our president would just sit back and eat some healthy food for a second to understand how powerful the gen-z world is. shawtys like a melody in my head that i cant keep out got me singing like NANANANNA everyday got my ipod stuck on replay replayayayayy. FIX YOUR HAIRLINE TRUMP THEN WE CAN TALK 🖕🏼
attributes.title: POOPY STUNKY APP 🤢🤢😡😡

attributes.review: I was looking for a good app about Trump but unfortunately all I’ve found is an Oompa Loompa making poor decisions... this app makes me feel so unsafe. I feel as if I cannot wake up, get some cereal, and have a glass of apple juice in the morning without fearing for my life as if someone was watching me, waiting for me to make one little mistake. I don’t want to fear that an angry orange man will take me away and throw me in a prison or out of a state that ***SHOULD BE SAFE!!!***
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review:
First of all this app is disgusting.💅🏽 The big letter T just throws me off!! 🥳What in the hell does the T stand for?!?! When I opened the app I see an  ✨expired orange✨ I don’t know😣 who’s idea it was to put an orange as the first thing you see, but I hope they remove it as soon as possible.😛

 I would also like to complain about how old🧚🏽‍♀️, wrinkly😔, disturbing 😱, scary🪑, dusty😼, and gross 🤢 the orange looks. The orange threw me off and made me ✨u n c o m f y✨

Thank you so much ☺️
attributes.title: ewwwwwwwwww
